price: Na mkizihisabu neema za Mwenyezi Mungu, hamwezi kuzidhibiti.Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye maghfira, Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: Na mkitaka kuzihisabu neema za Mwenyezi Mungu juu yenu, hamwezi kuzidhibiti. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwingi wa kusamehe, Mkunjufu wa rehema. Basi tubuni kwake, na mumsafie ibada, ili apate kukusameheni na kukurehemuni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-laha laghafūrun raḥīmun
